Play.Header: PIT wins toss, elects to defend the South goal, and SD elects to Receive.

Penalty on PIT-51-J.Farrior, Illegal Block Above the Waist, offsetting, enforced at PIT 41. Penalty on SD-57-M.Wilhelm, Unnecessary Roughness, offsetting.
San Diego challenged the pass completion ruling, and the play was Upheld. (Timeout #1 at 12:51.)
